Package org.ensor.robots.differentialdrive

This package contains the simulation code required to control a robot to follow a particular path laid out by the navigation system.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGoalReachedListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControlLoop  
    DifferentialDriveBiote
    This method implements the differential drive command system.
    DifferentialDriveServo  
    EncoderSpeedSensor  
    Model
    This class implements an elementary model for differential steering based on this paper.
    Model.SpeedAndTurnRate
    This class represents the speed of a differential drive assembly and the rate of turn.
    Model.WheelVelocities
    This class represents the state of movement of a differential drive assembly by representing the velocities of each of the two wheels.
    Module  
    Odometry
    This class represents an odometry calculator for differential drive mobile robots.
    PathFollower
    This Biote allows a path to be planned and followed.
    PathServo
    This class represents a control servo which acts to keep an object traveling in the direction of the given target point and traveling at an appropriate speed toward it.
    RingBuffer<T>  

Package org.ensor.robots.differentialdrive Description

This package contains the simulation code required to control a robot to follow a particular path laid out by the navigation system.
